card.name: And They Shall Know No Fear

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a creature type. Creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+0 and gain indestructible until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They are my bulwark against the Terror. They are the Defenders of Humanity. They are my Space Marines." - The Emperor of Mankind

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, lifelink Healing Tears - At the beginning of your end step, return target creature card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Defenders of Humanity enters the battlefield, create X 2/2 white Astartes Warrior creature tokens with vigilance. {X}{2}{W}, Exile Defenders of Humanity: Create X 2/2 white Astartes Warrior creature tokens with vigilance. Activate only if you control no creatures and only during your turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain vigilance and lifelink until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They all took up the cry, the missionaries, the pilgrims, the sisters of the Orders Militant. The forces of Chaos melted before the fire of their faith.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Rites of Banishment - When Grey Knight Paragon enters the battlefield, destroy target attacking creature. If that creature is a Demon, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our will shall be our weapons, our faith shall be our armour." - Canticle of Absolution

Grav-cannon - When Space Marine Devastator enters the battlefield, destroy up to one target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike, vigilance Concealed Position - When Space Marine Scout enters the battlefield, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Through blood and battle, scouts are forged from raw recruits into the Imperium's finest.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The practice of tracking and training Thunderwolves is a sort of initiation ritual into the upper echelons of the Wolf Guard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lifelink Praesidium Protectiva - When Triumph of Saint Katherine is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, exile it and the top six cards of your library in a face-down pile. If you do, shuffle that pile and put it back on top of your library. Miracle {1}{W} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

property.value: Squad {2} (As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay {2} any number of times. When this creature enters the battlefield, create that many tokens that are copies of it.) Other creatures you control get +1/+1.

property.value: Flash Vigilance Aegis of the Emperor - Commanders you control have protection from everything.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is no greater bulwark than the Praetors of the Adeptus Custodes, the bodyguards of the Emperor of Mankind.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Squad {2} (As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay {2} any number of times. When this creature enters the battlefield, create that many tokens that are copies of it.) property.name: Flavor
property.value: Harrowing visions, paralyzing pain, and terrifying brain spasms await those who challenge the cult.

property.value: Genestealer's Kiss - Whenever Genestealer Patriarch attacks, put an infection counter on target creature defending player controls. Children of the Cult - Whenever a creature with an infection counter on it dies, you create a token that's a copy of that creature, except it's a Tyranid in addition to its other types.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom in a random order.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, ward {3} Architect of Deception - When Lord of Change enters the battlefield, draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Lords of Change are Tzeentch's greatest servants. The most powerful of them wield fragments of his power over destiny.

property.value: "Though it may take an eternity, I will see the myriad dynasties united once more."

Arco-Flagellant can't block. Endurant - Pay 3 life: Arco-Flagellant gains indestructible until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control are artifacts in addition to their other types. The same is true for creature spells you control and creature cards you own that aren't on the battlefield. Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you lose 1 life and create a 2/2 black Necron Warrior artifact creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature. All creatures get -3/-3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Blight grenades - which induce horrendous effects on their victims - have no impact on the Death Guard, who gladly use the devices in extreme close quarters with the enemy.

Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{B}, {T}: Choose another target artifact creature you control. When that creature dies this turn, return it to the battlefield tapped under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are those who draw false comparisons between the tech-magi of the Adeptus Mechanicus and the xenotechnologists of the necron race. There can be no mercy for such heretics.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lifelink Flesh Flayer - When Flayed One enters the battlefield, mill three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those suspected of carrying the flayer curse are summarily banished, lest the corruption spread to other Necrons.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Immortality is not quite the same as invulnerability, but it is close enough."

Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only the deathless can truly comprehend the burden of unfailing loyalty." - Vargard Obyron of the Sautekh Dynasty

property.name: Rules

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am the Arch-fiend, the Despoiler of Worlds, and by my hands shall the false Emperor fall." - Abaddon the Despoiler

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This galaxy once knelt before us, and it will do so again."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target creature card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield tapped under your control, then exile that player's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In the embrace of the great Nurgle, I am no longer afraid, for with His pestilential favour I have become that which I once most feared: Death." - Kulvain Hestarius of the Death Guard

property.value: Enchant creature an opponent controls When enchanted creature dies, return Nurgle's Rot to its owner's hand and you create a 1/3 black Demon creature token named Plaguebearer of Nurgle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each plaguebearer is formed from the blighted soul of a mortal slain by Nurgle's Rot.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, put two eon counters on Out of the Tombs, then mill cards equal to the number of eon counters on it. If you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, instead return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If you can't, you lose the game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Rot Fly - If an opponent would gain life, that player loses that much life instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: High-ranking plaguebearers of Nurgle's realm ride into realspace mounted upon Rot Flies - colossal daemonic insects whose appearance is so repugnant it scars the mind.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Masters of dimensional dissonance, singularity manipulation, and countless other technologies, plasmancers are terrifying to behold.
